sentences.sContent: Their money problems were further aggravated by a rise in interest rates.
sentences.sCn: 由于利率上调，他们的财务问题更加严重。

sentences.sContent: Building the new road will only aggravate the situation .
sentences.sCn: 建造那条新路只会使情况恶化。

remMethod.val: ag(表加强) ＋ grav(重) ＋ ate(使…) → 使…重 → 加重， 使恶化

words.tran: 加重；恶化（aggravate的过去分词）；刺激

trans.tranOther: to make a bad situation, an illness, or an injury worse
